feed.title: GitHub Emacs Lisp Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Emacs Lisp in GitHub

entry.title: sabof/org-bullets
entry.summary:
utf-8 bullets for org-mode

org-bullets mode

Show org-mode bullets as UTF-8 characters.

Installation

Copy the file somewhere in your load-path, then add to your .emacs: 
(require 'org-bullets)
(add-hook 'org-mode-hook (lambda () (org-bullets-mode 1)))

select, do [M-x eval-region]. The *s will be replaced with utf-8 bullets next time you open an org file
